attributes.action: fully investigate why MP Sir Peter Viggers was able to claim for a floating duck island on his expenses, and why he now plans to sell it to raise money for charity, rather than to return money to the public purse.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: While we appreciate the sentiment of raising money for charity, this in not the ideal use of public funds.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
